title: Audio Jobs at Riot
body:
Hey! 

I’m very interested in working for Riot in the future and I was wondering which offices are used for / in charge of audio and sound.

I would also assume that audio jobs and jobs in general at riot would want some previous experience in game audio, is that right? I make my own music but haven’t done any games work.

I live in the UK and currently looking at universities. If the office in London does sound it would be awesome to have a look round!

replies.body: Hi, all of our in house sound design occurs at our LAX campus.  We do typically look for previous experience in game audio, or at least a strong interest in it when looking for candidates.
